name: RE-CONDITION
description:
REJUVENATE 

LAST EPISODE: RE-CONDITION


It takes courage in facing uncertainty into new condition. It’s a state that everyone should take. Re-condition is an open way into a new journey.

-
In this REJUVENATE series, hope can be encouragement to all of us in closing this challenging year. 

-
Watercolor on cold press paper 300gsm
Colored Pencil 

2078 × 3551 Pixel

Personal Use Only
